title: SET_PED_TO_RAGDOLL
content:
0x83CB5052// SetPedToRagdoll
void SET_PED_TO_RAGDOLL(Ped ped, int minTime, int maxTime, int ragdollType, BOOL bAbortIfInjured, BOOL bAbortIfDead, BOOL bForceScriptControl);Parameters:ped: The ped to ragdoll.minTime: Time(ms) Ped is in ragdoll mode; only applies to ragdoll types 0 and not 1.maxTime: ragdollType: bAbortIfInjured: unusedbAbortIfDead: unusedbForceScriptControl: p4/p5: Unusued in TU27Ragdoll Types0: CTaskNMRelax
1: CTaskNMScriptControl: Hardcoded not to work in networked environments.
Else: CTaskNMBalanceThis is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native SET_PED_TO_RAGDOLL.
codeBlocks:
// SetPedToRagdoll
